SEARCH
Package app

Class CardGameMediator

java.lang.Object
app.CardGameMediator
public class CardGameMediator extends Object
CardGameMediator class is responsible for managing Duo Card Game and implements the mediator design pattern to reduce coupling among player objects
Since:
20/03/2025
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Gökay Gülsoy

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CardGameMediator()
    default constructor that initializes data fields as follows currentPlayerPosition as 0 roundNumber as 1 gameDirection as "left" currentCardColor as null shouldDrawCard as false mustDrawCard as false amountOfCardsToBeDrawn as 0 isInitialRound as true isGameFinished as false players as null drawPile as null discardPile as null

  • Constructor Details

    • CardGameMediator

      public CardGameMediator()
      default constructor that initializes data fields as follows
      • currentPlayerPosition as 0
      • roundNumber as 1
      • gameDirection as "left"
      • currentCardColor as null
      • shouldDrawCard as false
      • mustDrawCard as false
      • amountOfCardsToBeDrawn as 0
      • isInitialRound as true
      • isGameFinished as false
      • players as null
      • drawPile as null
      • discardPile as null

    • getCurrentPlayerPosition

      public int getCurrentPlayerPosition()
      returns the value of the currentPlayerPosition field
      Returns:
      int that represents the position of the current player who is going to play

      returns the value of the field roundNumber.
      Returns:

      returns a reference to gameDirection field.
      Returns:
      String that represents the game direction

    • getCurrentCardColor

      public String getCurrentCardColor()
      returns a reference to currentCardColor field
      Returns:
      String that represents the color of the card located at the top of the draw pile

    • getShouldDrawCard

      public boolean getShouldDrawCard()
      returns the value of the shouldDrawCard field
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates whether next player has to draw card from draw pile

      public boolean getMustDrawCard()
      returns the value of the mustDrawCard field
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates whether next player must draw card from draw pile

      public int getAmountOfCardsToBeDrawn()
      returns the value of amountOfCardsToBeDrawn field
      Returns:
      int amount of cards that must be drawn by next player

    • getIsInitialRound

      public boolean getIsInitialRound()
      returns the value of isInitialRound field
      Returns:
      boolean value which is true if current round is the initial round, false otherwise

    • getIsGameFinished

      public boolean getIsGameFinished()
      returns the value of isGameFinished field
      Returns:
      boolean value which is true if game is finished, false otherwise

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      returns ArrayList of players for current round.
      Returns:
      ArrayList which contains all players in the game

    • getTopCardOfDiscardPile

      public Card getTopCardOfDiscardPile()
      returns the top card of discardPile above which player has to play card
      Returns:
      Card object which is a reference to top card of the discardPile

    • setShouldDrawCard

      public void setShouldDrawCard(boolean shouldDrawCondition)
      sets the shouldDrawCondition to given boolean. if it is true, player should draw card. if it is false, player doesn't draw card.
      Parameters:
      shouldDrawCondition - condition either true or false to indicate whether player has to draw card from draw pile or not which is imposed by previous player's play of Draw Two or Wild Draw Four card

    • setMustDrawCard

      public void setMustDrawCard(boolean mustDrawCard)
      sets the mustDrawCard field to given boolean. if it is true, player must draw card. if it is false, player does not draw card.
      Parameters:
      mustDrawCard - boolean value that indicates whether next player must draw card from draw pile

    • setGameDirection

      public void setGameDirection(String gameDirection)
      sets the gameDirection to given direction.
      Parameters:
      gameDirection - game direction to be set which is either "left" or "right"

    • setCurrentCardColor

      public void setCurrentCardColor(Color currentCardColor)
      sets the currentCardColor to given Color enum which represents the most recent color of the game
      Parameters:
      currentCardColor - color of the top card in the discardPile to be set

    • setAmountOfCardsToBeDrawn

      public void setAmountOfCardsToBeDrawn(int amountOfCardsToBeDrawn)
      sets the amountOfCardsToBeDrawn to given integer which indicates amount of cards to be drawn
      Parameters:
      amountOfCardsToBeDrawn - int value indicates the number of carts that must be drawn by next player

    • setInitialRound

      public void setInitialRound(boolean isInitialRound)
      sets the isInitialRound to given boolean. if it is true, it indicates that current round is initial round. if it is false, it indicates that current round is not initial round .
      Parameters:
      isInitialRound - boolean value to indicate whether current round is the initial round

    • setIsGameFinished

      public void setIsGameFinished(boolean isGameFinished)
      sets the isGameFinished to given boolean. if it is true, it indicates that game has finished. if it is false, it indicates that game has not yet finished
      Parameters:
      isGameFinished - boolean that represents whether game is finished or not

    • setDrawPile

      public void setDrawPile(ArrayList<Card> drawPile)
      set the draw pile as given draw pile
      Parameters:
      drawPile - new draw pile to be set

    • setDiscardPile

      public void setDiscardPile(ArrayList<Card> discardPile)
      sets the discard pile as given discard pile
      Parameters:
      discardPile - new discard pile to be set

    • setCurrentPlayerPosition

      public void setCurrentPlayerPosition(int position)
      set the position for current player to given position
      Parameters:
      position - int value that sets the position of the current player

    • placeCardToDiscardPile

      public void placeCardToDiscardPile(Card playedCard)
      add the played card to discard pile as a top card
      Parameters:
      playedCard - Card object played by player and added to the top of the discardPile

    • simulateDuoCardGame

      public void simulateDuoCardGame()
      runs the simulation for playing "Duo Card Game"

    • initGame

      public void initGame()
      initialize game by determining number of players and creating player objects

    • initRound

      public void initRound()
      called at the beginning of each round to initialize the round

    • playRound

      public void playRound(FileIO csvManipulator)

      round is played until one player plays his/her last card

      Parameters:
      csvManipulator - FileIO object that is used to record end of round information to CSV file

    • playForCurrentPlayer

      public void playForCurrentPlayer()
      player whose turn it is plays the game

    • createNewDrawPileIfNecessary

      public void createNewDrawPileIfNecessary()
      if amount of cards to be drawn is greater than or equal to drawPile size then create new drawPile from existing discardPile

    • dealCardsToStartGame

      public void dealCardsToStartGame(ArrayList<Card> deck)

      deal 7 card to each player at the start of the game

      Parameters:
      deck - ArrayList of Cards to be dealed among players

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards(ArrayList<Card> pile, String dealingDirection)
      deal cards in pile to all players in direction indicated by the dealingDirection
      Parameters:
      pile - pile of cards to be dealt among players
      dealingDirection - direction in which cards are to be dealt

    • removeCardFromDrawPile

      public Card removeCardFromDrawPile()

      removes and returns the top card of the drawPile

      Returns:
      Card object which is the at the top of the drawPile

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      returns a reference to player who will play next round.
      Returns:
      Player who will play next
